description: Retention of the installation of 6 air conditioning units ; installation of new side gate and fence
decision_conditions: By reason of their excessive quantity and positioning on the external elevations of the building, the proposed six air conditioning units will serve as an excessive and illogical development to the site, resulting in an incongruous and discordant form of development, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the area.

As such, this application fails to comply with the objectives of the policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), and SPD4. | By reason of their quantity, residential setting and proximity to neighbouring windows and amenity areas, the proposed six air conditioning units constitute an unneighbourly form of development, resulting in unacceptable degrees of noise, vibration and disturbance, to the detriment of the living conditions of neighbouring residents.
As such, this application fails to comply with policies D3, D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), and SPD4.
